title: General Motors Takes $1.6 Billion Hit From EV Strategy Shift

title: Ford F-150s in Tokyo? Japan’s Surprising Move to Please Washington

title: Lucid Bets Big in Tesla Territory With New Studios and Service Centers

descriptionSummary: Electric family vehicles in the US can be pricey, with even budget-friendly models costing upwards of $30,000 - not counting add-ons. Affordable seven-seat EVs are particularly elusive and often come with hefty price tags.

title: Average New Car Price Crosses $50K Barrier as Americans Struggle to Keep Up
description: Roughly halfway through the year, the average transaction price (ATP) of a new vehicle in the United States stood at $48,799. title: You’re Subsidizing New Car Sales Every Time You Pay for Repairs
